options.name: Foolishly Brave
options.description: The Kobold culture is built upon banding together and being fearless in the face of certain death. While there are 2 or more Allies within 6 Units, you are Immune to being Afraid.

options.name: Natural Throwing Arm
options.description: Often short of weaponry to support such a large population, it is commonplace in the Kobold culture to perfect accurate throwing to deter predators. Small Objects that you throw and Throwing Ammunition deal an additional 2 Damage and are upgraded to Critical Hits on a True Hit.

options.name: Good with Traps
options.description: The Kobold culture typically employs traps to protect their property and hard-won treasure. Gain +1 Thievery and +1 Engineering

options.name: Action : Skitterstrike
options.description: You move up to Half your Movement Speed. For every Creature you come within 1 Unit of, you can make an Attack with a Light or Unarmed Weapon.

options.name: The Draconic Legacy
options.description: The kobold culture was shaped by the dragons of old, and some knowledge of that magic still remains. Gain 3 Beginner and 3 Novice Draconic Spells.

options.name: Cavedwellers
options.description: Kobold societies are built underground, and those who dwell within learn to listen for subtle sounds to detect enemies. You gain +1 Search and Tremorsense up to 6 Units.

options.name: Free Action : Reckless Abandon
options.description: You dedicate yourself to all out aggression against a Creature that is two sizes or more larger than you. Until the start of your next turn, you gain a 1d4 Bonus to Attacks against this Creature but suffer a 1d4 Penalty to all Defense Checks against them.
